title: Oregon Elementary School Bans Pledge of Allegiance
subtitle: A fake news story claims the nonexistent principal of a nonexistent Oregon school is banning recitation of the Pledge of Allegiance for the remainder of the 2016-17 school year.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The principal of Mountain Dell Elementary School in Oregon sent a letter to parents informing them that the Pledge of Allegiance will be banned for the remainder of the school year.
